testCase.name: SelectRequirements Does not show when 'isOpen' == false
SelectRequirements Shows when 'isOpen' == true
SelectRequirements Displays child component
handleProductsDropdown should return an array of dropdown options based on the status parameter
handleProductsDropdown should filter out options based on the isChecker parameter
handleProductsDropdown should filter out options based on the permissions parameter
TableComponent should render a table with headers and rows
TableComponent should display a loading indicator when data is being fetched
TextCellContent renders text content and dot correctly
TextCellContent renders "-" when value is falsy
ProductNameCellContent renders product code correctly
ProductNameCellContent renders "-" when product code is falsy
UpdatedOnCellContent should render the date and time in the correct format
UpdatedOnCellContent should render nothing when value is null or undefined
UpdatedOnCellContent should render nothing when value is not a valid date
UpdatedOnCellContent should render nothing when value is not a string or a date object
UpdatedOnCellContent should render the date and time in the correct format for a different timezone
StateCellContent should render a span element with the given value as its text content
StateCellContent should apply a class to the span element based on the value passed to the function
StatusCellContent should render a span element with the specific class based on the value passed as props
StatusCellContent should call handleUserView function to determine the text content of the span element
StatusCellContent should call handleColorState function to determine the background color of the span element
StatusCellContent should render a span element with the default class and value as text content when the value passed as props does not match any of the cases in handleUserView and handleColorState
StatusCellContent should default the isChecker prop to false if it is not a boolean
StatusCellContent should render a FaEye icon next to the text content
ActionsCellContent should render a DropdownButton component with the given dropDownOptions and onClick props
ActionsCellContent should render a DropdownButton component with empty options when dropDownOptions prop is not provided
ComboSelect renders without crashing
ComboSelect matches snapshot
ComboSelect should open the dropdown when the button is clicked
ComboSelect should update selected options when all products and their members are selected
ComboSelect should update selected options when a product and its members are deselected
ComboSelect should update selected options when all products and their members are deselected
ComboSelect should filter the options correctly when searching for a product
ComboSelect should update selected options when a product and its members are selected
closeDropdown should set isOpen state to false when called with setIsOpen(false)
closeDropdown should not throw an error when called with setIsOpen(undefined)
closeDropdown should not throw an error when called with setIsOpen(null)
closeDropdown should not throw an error when called with setIsOpen(0)
closeDropdown should not throw an error when called with setIsOpen("")
closeDropdown should not throw an error when called with setIsOpen({})
handleChange should add a new product to selOptions if it doesnt exist
handleChange should remove a product from selOptions if it already exists
productContainsMember should return true when the product contains the member
productContainsMember should return false when the product does not contain the member
productContainsMember should return false when the product is empty
productContainsMember should return false when the member is empty
productContainsMember should return false when the member is null
addNewProduct should return a new array with the new product added to the end of the input array
addNewProduct should not modify the input array
addNewProduct should work with an empty input array
createProduct should return an object with "product" and "members" properties when valid id and members are provided
createProduct should return an object with an empty "members" array when no members are provided
createProduct should handle special characters and spaces in id and member names
createProduct should handle a large number of members
createProduct should handle empty strings as id and member names
handleMemberToggle should add member to product when member is not selected
handleMemberToggle should remove member from product when member is already selected
handleMemberToggle should add product and member to selected options when product is not selected
handleMemberToggle should add member to product when product is already selected but with no members
handleMemberToggle should add member to product when product is already selected with other members
addMemberToProduct should add a member to a product with no existing members
addMemberToProduct should add a member to a product with existing members
addMemberToProduct should return the original products array if memberId is undefined
addMemberToProduct should return the original products array if memberId is already in the product
removeMemberFromProduct should remove a member from a product with multiple members
removeMemberFromProduct should remove a member from a product with only one member
removeMemberFromProduct should handle removing a non-existent member from a product
